title: She saw purity at Asr & assumed she was pure during dhuhr, should she make up dhuhr? assim al hakeem
transcript: so if a woman checks for her Purity during the beginning of and she's still on her Menses then she checks again after and she found out that she was actually like pure towards the end of but she didn't know she didn't check so does she now have to pray as well or just the prayer of is not to be prayed unless you were certain that you were pure at the time of the due to the fact that you checked or that woman checked after and saw her Purity she has no right to assume that oh had I checked half an hour ago probably I would have seen my Purity because certainity is not affected by doubt the certainty is she's still on her mensis this certainty is not taken away unless we are certain that she she is pure and this would not be confirmed except after and therefore she does not do her
